description: Towards a National Action Plan to Empower Single Mothers

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Output 1: Identifying trends and underlying causes of single motherhood and determining the socio-economic profile of single mothers, taking into account cultural factors
Output 2: Identifying a system for building and maintaining a national register of single mothers in Malaysia
Output 3: Evaluation of existing policies and programmes that aim to address the needs of single mothers and identification of best practices
Output 4: A national action plan to empower single mothers developed
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: SEDC: Single Mothers

title: SEDC: Empower Single Mothers
